{{also|wein|wéin}} ==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|wīn}}, from {{inh|de|goh|wīn}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*wīną}}, from {{der|de|la|vīnum}}, from {{der|de|ine-pro|*wóih₁nom}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/vaɪ̯n/}} * {{rhymes|de|aɪ̯n}} * {{audio|de|De-Wein.ogg|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Weines|gen2=Weins|Weine}} # [[wine]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|e}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|weinartig}} * {{l|de|Wasser predigen und Wein trinken}} ====Related terms==== {{rel3|de |Biowein |Franzwein |Glühwein |Landwein |Rotwein |Tafelwein |Schaumwein |Weißwein |Weinberg |Weinbrand |Weinfass |Weinflasche |Weingarten |Weinglas |Weingummi |Weinhandel |Weinjahr |Weinjahrgang |Weinkäufer |Weinkeller |Weinladen |Weinlese |Weinranke |Weinrebe |Weinschenke |Weintraube |Weinverkostung }} ====Descendants==== * {{desc|bor=1|et|vein}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Alcoholic beverages]] [[Category:de:Grapevines]] [[Category:de:Wine]] ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/vaɪ̯n/}} ===Noun=== {{head|hrx|noun|g=m|plural|Weine|diminutive|Weinche}} # [[wine]] #: {{ux|hrx|Ich drinke keen '''Wein'''.|I don't drink '''wine'''.}} ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary] ---- ==Rhine Franconian== ===Noun=== {{head|gmw-rfr|noun|head=Wein}} # {{lb|gmw-rfr|Palatine}} [[wine]]
